h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: A few moves will be altered slightly, as instead of tearing up the ground with his rake, he can send muddy projectiles your way instead, which seem to have a more more narrow arc to compensate for your diminished evasion.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
A few moves will be altered slightly, as instead of tearing up the ground with his rake, he can send muddy projectiles your way instead, which seem to have a more more narrow arc to compensate for your diminished evasion.
